participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and nurturing, with a love for creativity and music.
participant_1.background: i'm getting married in the spring. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i love eating out with friends. i'm 24 years old. my favorite singer is taylor swift.

participant_2.name: Tam
participant_2.personality: Playful and imaginative, with a fascination for letters and chocolate.
participant_2.background: i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i am four years old. i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.
